topics.body:
so my sister sent us some stuff from germany, that has finally arrived
bunch of cool gifts and a letter

i kind of feel bad for my sis though
because she got me a european copy of hyrule warriors, so I could use it to learn german

but I don't think it will work on my wii u, will it?
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:

I dunno.
It might, but subtitles will be turned on, maybe.
Haven't spent a lot of time with my Wii U -before I lost it-
